title: Nurse Soraka
body:
http://puu.sh/lJHgE/5a0fb008ef.jpg

Possible we get this? In memory of a fallen player.

http://www.twitlonger.com/show/n_1snuij5

replies.body: actually why is that skin not a thing already?
http://revisitinghaven.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/well_ya_got_me_by_all_accounts_it_doesnt_make_sense.gif
I mean it fits so perfectly. I'm wondering why Rito didn't use healers like Janna, Nidalee, Soraka, etc. for the nurse skin line. Instead they used... ninjas?

> [{quoted}](name=Mister Sunglow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-12-05T21:11:21.047+0000)
>
> I mean it fits so perfectly. I'm wondering why Rito didn't use healers like Janna, Nidalee, Soraka, etc. for the nurse skin line. Instead they used... ninjas?

hear hear... wait Nidalee?
Nidalee does have a heal attached to her AS buff, so she is a healer.

> [{quoted}](name=Leadpaintchips,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=0000000200000000,timestamp=2015-12-06T12:42:08.855+0000)
>
> Nidalee does have a heal attached to her AS buff, so she is a healer.

meh it should be reserved for champions that heal allies
... Nidalee CAN heal allies, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Mister Sunglow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-12-05T21:11:21.047+0000)
>
> I mean it fits so perfectly. I'm wondering why Rito didn't use healers like Janna, Nidalee, Soraka, etc. for the nurse skin line. Instead they used... ninjas?

#I shall answer your question in a way that will blow your mind.

Q:
Where do ninjas come from?  
A:
Asia!
Q: What does the average Asian Father require of his children?

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/d2/d20b50f7d0d15ff2111392b02d6fa5b404725da8da98067092647e0e238f0851.jpg

{{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:98}}  But we want to be ninjas!

http://i3.ytimg.com/vi/J70NsqJOyU8/mqdefault.jpg
Same reason star guardian Soraka isn't a thing, None! Big missed opportunity here riot lol.
It's a little on the nose.

Skins don't have to oppose the classic skin, ya know :V

Look at Lee Sin skins. A lot of them are really close to his lore. Police Vi also counts, considering... that she's already a cop. Same with Caitlyn. Nurse Soraka wouldn't be too far off, not to mention that it would allow her to have an entirely new look and maybe spell effects (Q as a syringe, anybody?).

Speaking as one of Said Player's friends, I really feel that begging for a skin for her is Wrong.
Do I want her Immortalized in the game? Yes, I do. I think it's the very LEAST she deserves. But this much focus on the Skin Idea feels like an insult to her Memory.

That Picture was drawn as a "Get Well" to her while she was in the hospital, as well.

OP, I understand that you don't mean any harm, but I would appreciate an edit to your post to focus more on Remembering our friend instead of asking for merchandise.

> [{quoted}](name=Madoka KanameSan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-12-05T09:08:40.891+0000)
>
> Speaking as one of Said Player's friends, I really feel that begging for a skin for her is Wrong.
> Do I want her Immortalized in the game? Yes, I do. I think it's the very LEAST she deserves. But this much focus on the Skin Idea feels like an insult to her Memory.
> 
> That Picture was drawn as a "Get Well" to her while she was in the hospital, as well.
> 
> OP, I understand that you don't mean any harm, but I would appreciate an edit to your post to focus more on Remembering our friend instead of asking for merchandise.

Katey Khaos is running it by the skin department. No promises though. I only made this thread to get the word out on the skin and about a player from a community I have no idea about because far as I know of I didn't see anyone do the same here on the boards and after reading what I did learn of her I felt bad I didn't get to know her as she sounded like a great person. I'm not begging for a skin. I'm asking for a skin. All I did was create a thread to get the word out. Regardless what you think its a great skin concept. I will not be editing my post. I never knew the person which was further explained in the comment section of this thread. Since you know her personally then create a better thread as you would be more knowledgeable on the issue you apparently have instead of calling me out for "begging for a skin". If the skin doesn't get made oh well. It won't be the 1st time or the last time a skin with a great concept or meaning behind won't get made.

I Should probably apologise, it was Super early in the morning, I was tired and not in the best of moods when I wrote it.

I'm Sorry, I was not intending to imply you were simply begging for a skin or the likes, and I know you understand the full meaning behind the skin concept, even if you didn't know her yourself. I think the skin is a great Idea. It fits her perfectly.

There was a large influx of "omfg soraka skin when" literally the DAY we found out she had passed, and it was sickening to see. It sorta biased me against people just asking for it.

Again, I know you most certainly aren't trying to insult or deface anyone's memory with any of this. You really did nothing wrong. I am just being sore about it.

Good luck in your future games, I apologize if I caused any offense or upset.
You have my up vote and I'm sorry for your loss :( i didn't know her at all but she seemed like a very kindhearted person

> [{quoted}](name=Madoka KanameSan,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-12-05T09:08:40.891+0000)
>
> Speaking as one of Said Player's friends, I really feel that begging for a skin for her is Wrong.
> Do I want her Immortalized in the game? Yes, I do. I think it's the very LEAST she deserves. But this much focus on the Skin Idea feels like an insult to her Memory.
> 
> That Picture was drawn as a "Get Well" to her while she was in the hospital, as well.
> 
> OP, I understand that you don't mean any harm, but I would appreciate an edit to your post to focus more on Remembering our friend instead of asking for merchandise.

I'm really sorry for your loss, truly. Tbh I'm somewhat surprised this isn't ingame already since {{champion:16}}'s **the** healing champion, but I also think that asking for this skin is kinda tarnishing, not to be a downer. Still, great concept

yes, this^
She was an incredible person for those who knew her, and she deserves some recognition :)
Would be good of riot if they made such a skin once a year and donated all the peoceeds to a charities in all the regions
Beautiful skin, I think it's lovely and should totally exist!
Comm on Riot, you guys did it before with Jaximus, could even give her a unique quote like Jaximus has.

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-12-05T04:02:19.090+0000)
>
> Comm on Riot, you guys did it before with Jaximus, could even give her a unique quote like Jaximus has.

Not trying to be rude about someone's death but they can't make a skin for every league player that dies, and they can't make a one-time exception because people would take it for granted and there would be no end to requests.
also in honor of Madoka KanameSan's friend, I must also mention that I am sorry for the loss of a good friend
here's to you kid {{champion:24}}
Looks a lot like a magical girl...
i wouldnt want a skin in memory of a fallen player considering riot would be making profit off of it.

> [{quoted}](name=Luffy The Pirate,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2015-12-06T03:12:46.013+0000)
>
> i wouldnt want a skin in memory of a fallen player considering riot would be making profit off of it.

Jaximus Jax skin?
Well Riot are making money off of that too so that's also an issue  :/

> [{quoted}](name=Luffy The Pirate,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=001600020000,timestamp=2015-12-07T00:03:07.897+0000)
>
> Well Riot are making money off of that too so that's also an issue  :/

It's not issue imo. Riot is a busniess. Riot doesn't have to make the skin or put a reference to anyone in the skin like Jaximus quote. But it's nice of them to do so. Riot isn't the bad guy and isn't obligated in anyway to hand out anything free or do anything for players or its community. The fact Riot does do things for us such as Dravens legendary skin being discounted for a huge price for ever is huge. Riot generally does what it can if it can most of the time if they have the time for it. Riot isn't some big bad boogeyman.

They make a tribute to someones death, it's such a good tribute that they make money off of it... They'd be profiting off of someone dying... i don't think or want this skin to be a reality because this skin was drawn for her as a get well present and it'll become a reality  without her even getting it... a good majority of buyers wouldn't even know... sigh...

> [{quoted}](name=Luffy The Pirate,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=00160002000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-12T12:14:21.785+0000)

They'd be profiting off of someone dying... i don't think or want this skin to be a reality because this skin was drawn for her as a get well present and it'll become a reality  without her even getting it... a good majority of buyers wouldn't even know... sigh...

Heck none of us knows, who is Sora?
twitter.com/Ahrzayl

> [{quoted}](name=Luffy The Pirate,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=00160002000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-12T12:14:21.785+0000)

They'd be profiting off of someone dying... i don't think or want this skin to be a reality because this skin was drawn for her as a get well present and it'll become a reality  without her even getting it... a good majority of buyers wouldn't even know... sigh...

Well I see what your saying but actually Nurse Soraka is a skin concept from a few years back. Going back to at least 2013 or as far as it being mentioned even as earlier as 2012 when Nurse Akali was being questioned. If you google even harder you will notice that it was even asked for 2011. Nurse Soraka even had cos-players dressing as one. Having a quote like Jaximus would be great. Riot could even make a thread or a news report regarding the Situation and Sora who was a Soraka main from what I have gathered.

The Image I happened to use of course was for a get well card. According to a post of KateyKhaos on surrender@20, she wasn't making any promises but was pitching it to the skins team if I recall correctly.

Who doesn't want skins in memory of dead players?

Not DeceasedL0ved0ne, that's for sure.
its the fact that riot would profit off of it... it doesnt seem ethical :/

They profit off of tricking children into signing a contract that claims they have no ownership of the account or products they buy. 

If you're against unethical behavior, you're against the game.
ummm ... :/ you're missing my point

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey D Luffy,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=001600010000,timestamp=2015-12-06T08:37:17.914+0000)
>
> its the fact that riot would profit off of it... it doesnt seem ethical :/

Riot is a business you dolt. Making money is kind of what businesses do... People die everyday. I don't think a skin should be made to honor one person who isn't anymore special then the rest of us. I could understand a war veteran.. But someone who plays the game? Really

Exactly, and that's why it'd be bad, unless they donated profits or otherwise they'd be on the receiving end.

And I agree with your second statement too...

Oh and this post was 9 months ago >_>

> [{quoted}](name=Monkey D Luffy,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0Qkgm0dL,comment-id=00160001000000010000,timestamp=2016-09-04T10:35:28.535+0000)

You could care less? So you care a little bit?

Totally

I was happy to see the drawing at first, but then ... the feels came in when I read the description. Rest in peace, you did us all proud...

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

This skin will never happen because for you be a nurse, you first need to be...
A ninja.

So this skin means ninja soraka confirmed?
omg, I would buy this skin in a heartbeat
Logged into this just to up vote the post i didn't know Sora personally but it's still sad and i want to see this skin in the game
I think it fits Sorakas theme perfectly. Also, it would be great to honor it for a fellow player. I didn't know her, but I heard about it through Twitter. She sounded pretty amazing honestly.

4 years later i find it weird that akali has a nurse skin even though she has no natural heal, even her healing on her q was taken out, and soraka doesnt have one.... also ^ LUL she got a star guardian skin. Really funny.

We won't ever get Nurse Soraka now. We got Program medical bot Soraka skin https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yHno1pJn8IY/VvGjrlcZV6I/AAAAAAAAMc8/NYgRySLGiYMuKn85iwPkEZQXWDWKygCBA/s1600/soraka.jpg

It would be a miracle to get Nurse Soraka when we have a robot Nurse Soraka skin no one wanted.
